name: RELOOP PLATFORM
goal:
Reloop’s vision is a world free of pollution, where an ambitious and integrated circular economy allows our precious resources to remain resources, so that people, businesses and nature can flourish.

To achieve the organization’s vision, Reloop works with governments, industry and society to accelerate the global transition to a circular economy for all resources.
euInitiatives: Focusing on the implementation of the Single Use Plastics Directive and the Waste Directive
